short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to capture Ctrl+W and send keyboard event to xterm to avoid closing the tab accidentally.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use
1. Install this extension
2. Go to extension shortcut configuration page of your browser
    edge://extensions/shortcuts for Edge
    chrome://extensions/shortcuts for Chrome
3. Find this extension and configure "Capture ctrl+w" command's keyboard shortcut to "Ctrl + W"
